session_metadata.summary: Built automated trainer feedback analysis system with email outreach generation

conversation_flow.user_request: Write a Python script that loads and cleans CSV, assigns row_ids, parses dates, computes composite scores, calculates improvement metrics for trainers, ranks top 2, extracts positive quotes, and outputs results.json with case study angles plus console table
assistant_actions: Found CSV file in directory
Read and analyzed CSV structure (95 records)
Created analyze_trainer_feedback.py script
Implemented row_id assignment (R0001, R0002, etc.)
Parsed Creation Date to datetime
Calculated composite scores from 7 metrics (1.3, 1.4, 2.8, 2.9, v1_1.2, v2_1.1, v2_1.2)
Split feedback into early vs late periods
Calculated improvement = mean(late) - mean(early)
Filtered trainers with â‰¥3 responses (18 found)
Ranked and selected Top 2 trainers
Extracted positive quotes using keyword matching
Generated case study angles based on improvement scores
Output results.json with all requested data
Created formatted console table output
Identified issue: user running /usr/local/bin/python3 instead of conda python
Installed pandas and numpy in conda environment
Updated shebang to use conda python
Created run_analysis.sh convenience script
Verified script runs successfully

conversation_flow.user_request: Add CSV and HTML outputs in addition to JSON
assistant_actions: Enhanced script to generate 3 output formats
Created results.csv with flattened data structure
Generated HTML report with professional styling
Included all metrics, quotes, and case study angles in all formats

conversation_flow.user_request: Redesign HTML with clean, modern UI inspired by be:impact website
assistant_actions: Analyzed be:impact brand colors (navy #001f5c, pink #e91e63)
Redesigned HTML with modern gradient header
Implemented card-based layout with hover effects
Added circular rank badges (gold #1, silver #2)
Created interactive metrics grid
Styled case study sections with green gradients
Designed quote cards with pink accents
Made fully responsive for mobile
Added be/impact branding in footer
design_features: Card-based layout with shadows and hover effects
Clean metrics grid with hover animations

conversation_flow.user_request: Script outline for Loom video explaining the project
assistant_actions: Created detailed 8:30 minute video script
Structured with timestamps and sections
Included demo instructions for each output format
Explained technical methodology
Listed key benefits and use cases
Provided quick reference for what to have open during recording

conversation_flow.user_request: Task 2: Generate personalized outreach emails from results.json
assistant_actions: Created generate_outreach.py script
Implemented first name extraction from emails
Generated warm, conversational email templates
Included specific learner quotes as evidence
Added two-part ask: testimonial + case study chat
Created clear, low-pressure call to action
Saved to outreach_ready.json with required schema
Printed formatted emails to console
email_features: Clear CTA: 'Just reply to this email'

assistant_actions: Created organized directory structure
Created data/ folder for input CSV
Created scripts/ folder for Python scripts and shell script
Created outputs/ folder for all generated files
Created assets/ folder for images
Updated all script paths to work with new structure
Tested all scripts to ensure they work
Created README.md with full documentation
Created QUICK_START.md for quick reference

conversation_flow.user_request: Save this chat log as JSON in the repo
assistant_actions: Created comprehensive chat_log.json
Documented all conversation steps
Captured decisions, actions, and outputs
Included file metadata and technical details

Trend analysis across multiple time periods
Expand to analyze all trainers, not just top 2
